text: Melinda Sun (born 23 February 1995) is an Australian badminton player. In 2013, she won the bronze medal at the Oceania Junior Championships in the mixed doubles event partnered with Pit Seng Low. In 2016, she won the silver medal at the Oceania Championships in the women's doubles event partnered with Gronya Somerville. == Achievements == ===Oceania Championships=== Women's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !
